snippet: Chris Horner became the oldest champion of one of Europe’s grand tours. He also is the first American to win the race.
abstract: American cyclist Chris Horner completes biggest victory of his career, winning Vuelta a Espana at 41 to become the oldest champion of one of cycling's three-week grand tours in Europe.
lead_paragraph: Chris Horner became the oldest champion of one of Europe’s grand tours. He also is the first American to win the race.

headline.main: At 41, American Cyclist Is Oldest Champion of Vuelta a España
